Parameters: Bundle: The Bundle that holds the previously saved state.
dispatchRestoreInstanceState(android.os..Description: Called by @B_android#support#v7#preference#Preference#restoreHierarchyState_E@ to retrieve the saved state for this Preference and its children. May be overridden to modify how restoring happens to the children of a Preference. For example, some Preference objects may not want to save state for their children.

Returns: True if the contained preferences should be shown on the same screen as this preference.
isOnSameScreenAsChildren().Description: Whether this preference group should be shown on the same screen as its contained preferences.

Returns: The @B_android#support#v7#preference#Preference_E@ with the key, or null.
Parameters: CharSequence: The key of the preference to retrieve.
findPreference(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Finds a @B_android#support#v7#preference#Preference_E@ based on its key. If two @B_android#support#v7#preference#Preference_E@ share the same key (not recommended), the first to appear will be returned (to retrieve the other preference with the same key, call this method on the first preference). If this preference has the key, it will not be returned. This will recursively search for the preference into children that are also @B_android#support#v7#preference#PreferenceGroup_E@.

onDetached().Description: Called when the Preference hierarchy has been detached from the list of preferences. This can also be called when this Preference has been removed from a group that was attached to the list of preferences.

Parameters: Bundle: The Bundle in which to save the instance of this Preference.
dispatchSaveInstanceState(android.os.Bun.Description: Called by @B_android#support#v7#preference#Preference#saveHierarchyState_E@ to store the instance for this Preference and its children. May be overridden to modify how the save happens for children. For example, some Preference objects may want to not store an instance for their children.

onAttached().Description: Called when the Preference hierarchy has been attached to the list of preferences. This can also be called when this Preference has been attached to a group that was already attached to the list of preferences.

Returns: The number of preference children in this group.

onPrepareForRemoval().Description: Called when this Preference is being removed from the hierarchy. You should remove any references to this Preference that you know about. Make sure to call through to the superclass implementation.

Parameters: int: The index of the @B_android#support#v7#preference#Preference_E@ to retrieve.
getPreference(int).Description: Returns the @B_android#support#v7#preference#Preference_E@ at a particular index.

Returns: Whether this group orders based on the order the children are added.
isOrderingAsAdded().Description: Whether this group is ordering preferences in the order they are added.

Parameters: boolean: Whether this Preference should disable its dependents.
notifyDependencyChange(boolean).Description: Notifies any listening dependents of a change that affects the dependency.

Parameters: boolean: Whether to order according to the order added.
setOrderingAsAdded(boolean).Description: Whether to order the @B_android#support#v7#preference#Preference_E@ children of this group as they are added. If this is false, the ordering will follow each Preference order and default to alphabetic for those without an order. If this is called after preferences are added, they will not be re-ordered in the order they were added, hence call this method early on.

ClassDesc: A container for multiple @B_android#support#v7#preference#Preference_E@ objects. It is a base class for Preference objects that are parents, such as @B_android#support#v7#preference#PreferenceCategory_E@ and @B_android#support#v7#preference#PreferenceScreen_E@.
